divs: Sighting DetailsNothing to say here, was snapping pictures of the ship and saw object on upper left, thought it was weird, bot prob a plane so I thought nothing of it and kept taking pictures. I snapped picture twice since the first time was blurry of the ship, so snapped a second one immediately within a sec as I know my camera is the way to get a clear picture. Noticed that in that 1 second window the 4 lights moved in a split second.. although I saw them, I thought nothing of them at the time, but now I dont know. Wish to submit pictures for report.
Summary: Was trying to get a good night picture of my cruise ship and caught my eye
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in San Juan
There were no other sightings in San Juan on or around September 9th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
